title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, October 28, 2020
description: It's the birthday of Dr. Jonas Salk, born in New York City (1914), who developed a polio vaccine at the height of a polio epidemic in the mid-1950s.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of Dr. Jonas Salk, born in New York City (1914), who developed a polio vaccine at the height of a polio epidemic in the mid-1950s.
